name: This Means Warp
description:
This Means Warp is a cooperative roguelike game set in a dystopian sci-fi universe.

One to four players work together to run a spaceship as you traverse a procedurally generated map in real-time, engaging in both combat and non-combat encounters. Facing increasingly dangerous enemies, upgrade your ship and purchase new sub-systems as you progress. The stakes are high - if your ship is destroyed, it’s game over.

Play solo, with friends, or with strangers

  • Online or local
  • Work together to develop combat strategies

Intense, real-time combat

  • Target individual ship systems or disrupt AI characters
  • Increasing difficulty ramp with upgrades and new items
  • High stakes ship permadeath

Addictive and endlessly replayable

  • Procedurally generated maps and enemies
  • Randomized items mean progression and tactics change on the fly
  • Easy to pick up, difficult to master systems
  • Unlock items/upgrades/characters
